system.requirement: Your body can be pushed beyond normal human limits.

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} +iron, add +1. Also, when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death}, you may roll +iron (instead of +heart). If you do, add +1 but treat a weak hit as a miss.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +iron using brute force or feats of endurance, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge using swift reflexes, speed, or feats of acrobatics, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
